attributes.action: Referendum on membership of the EEC
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, call upon the UK Government to arrange a referendum for the people of the United Kingdom to decide on whether we should proceed with our current timetable for full membership of the European Economic Community and the Eurozone, or whether we should pull out altogether, and that all members of the House of Parliament and House of Lords be given free choice as to how they vote, without being told how to do so by their respective Whips.
